column2: hot mess.  I knew I was in trouble from the beginning when I ordered a half slab and requested the large end.  Not only did the order taker not know what the large end was
column3: but when asked she informed me that customers usually do not specify which end of the slab they want (note taken about the customers).  I was also certain at this point that the fries would not be served nestled beneath the ribs or that 2 pieces of white bread would be found atop my ribs
column4: but that is all forgivable.  I also ordered the pulled pork taste and brisket taste.
